    • Method Detail

      • accept

        public final boolean accept(MonteCarloResults oldResult,
                            MonteCarloResults newResult)
        Description copied from interface: MonteCarloAcceptor
        Accept a step in a Monte Carlo path/chain based on the ratio of the results at each step.
        Specified by:
        accept in interface MonteCarloAcceptor
        Parameters:
        oldResult - the results at the previous step.
        newResult - the result at the current (proposed) step.
        Returns:
        true if the step that generated newResults is to be accepted, false otherwise.
